(2nd title) |website = [http://www.feb.es/ www.feb.es {{es icon}}] |ceo = |TV = [[Teledeporte]] }} '''Liga Femenina''' is the top women's league of [[basketball in Spain]]. It was founded in 1964. ==Competition format== The league is similar to [[Liga ACB]], each team has to play all the other teams in its division twice, one at home and one away, At the end of the league, the eight best teams start a play-off. ===Qualification for European competitions=== The best three teams qualify for the [[EuroLeague Women]], others club qualify for [[EuroCup Women]]. ==
